Html:
Good evening,

 

Is it possible to retrieve the task history (the informations and error messages)? I haven't seen any property to do this.

 

Also, I have created a task with some triggers; but their Id (by Trigger.Id) is always null. Why? I need them to update the triggers without deleting.

 

 

Nevertheless, your library is really useful. I couldn't manage to use COM objects!
Shame on me, this kind of messages are in the Event Viewer...
You can find an example of how to get the event history for a task in the TaskEditor project in the TaskEvent.cs file. These classes should work outside of the project if you want to reuse them.

Wonderful, I didn't expect an answer. I'll probably reuse this classes, it will simplify my work :)

Thanks again!
